According To The <WG2596> Purpose <WG4286> Of The <WG3588> Ages, <WG165> Which <WG3739> He Made <WG4160> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> <WG3588> <WG2962> Our Lord, <WG2257>
